     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Introduction to Women's Studies  &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:758px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17345062">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17345062">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17345062">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding Background Information on Your Social Problem: Selected Reference Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17345062">
          <blockquote>
           <p>
            <strong>
             21st Century Sociology: A Reference Handbook
            </strong>
            (2007)
            <strong>
             <br />
            </strong>
            Location: Trexler Library Reference Collection 301 T971c v.1-2 (Level A)
           </p>
           <p>
            <strong>
             <a href="http://0-www.credoreference.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/">
              Credo Reference
             </a>
            </strong>
            <br />
            <span class="note">
             Location: Online (search the library catalog by title)
             <br />
             <em>
              Provides access to a collection of aggregated and integrated reference books from high-quality publishers.
             </em>
            </span>
           </p>
           <p>
            <strong>
             <a href="http://0-find.galegroup.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/2GEK">
              Encyclopedia of Gender and Society
             </a>
            </strong>
            (2009)
            <br />
            Location:
            <a href="http://0-find.galegroup.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/2GEK">
             Online
            </a>
           </p>
           <p>
            <strong>
             <a href="http://0-www.credoreference.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/vol/576">
              Encyclopedia of Women and Gender: Sex Similarities and Differences and the Impact of Society on Gender
             </a>
            </strong>
            (2001)
            <br />
            Location:
            <a href="http://0-www.credoreference.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/vol/576">
             Online
            </a>
            (search the library catalog by title) or Trexler Library Reference Collection 305.403 E56e v.1-2 (Level A)
           </p>
           <p>
            <strong>
             Men and Masculinities: A Social, Cultural, and Historical Encyclopedia
            </strong>
            (2004)
            <br />
            Location: Trexler Library Reference Collection 305.3103 K49m v.1-2 (Level A)
           </p>
          </blockquote>
          <div id="boxatt17345062" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17345112">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17345112">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17345112">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding Information on Your Social Problem
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17345112">
          <p>
           <strong>
            FINDING ARTICLES
           </strong>
          </p>
          <blockquote>
           <p>
            Check the
            <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu">
             Subject Guides
            </a>
            (e.g., the
            <a href="http://www.muhlenberg.edu/subsplus/subjects/display.php?subject=womensstudies">
             Women's Studies guide
            </a>
            or
            <a href="http://www.muhlenberg.edu/subsplus/subjects/display.php?subject=sociology">
             Sociology guide
            </a>
            ) for links to other recommended databases, as well as other resources.
            <br />
            <em>
             GETTING THERE: Library Homepage -- Subject Guides (in the Research box)
            </em>
           </p>
           <p>
            <strong>
             SELECTED DATABASES TO SEARCH FOR SCHOLARLY AND POPULAR ARTICLES
            </strong>
           </p>
           <p>
            <em>
             See a list of all databases via the Library Homepage &nbsp;--&nbsp;
             <a href="http://www.muhlenberg.edu/subsplus/subjects/databases.php?letter=all">
              Databases A to Z
             </a>
             (in the Quick Links box).
            </em>
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://0-search.ebscohost.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=aph">
             Academic Search Complete
            </a>
            <br />
            Full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://0-www.csa.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/htbin/dbrng.cgi?username=muhlenberg&amp;access=welcome&amp;db=assia-set-c&amp;adv=1">
             ASSIA: Applied Social Sciences Index and Abstracts
            </a>
            <br />
            Indexes journals in sociology, psychology, political science, health, social work, education, and more.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://0-newfirstsearch.oclc.org.library.muhlenberg.edu/done=http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//;dbname=cwi;fsip">
             Contemporary Women&rsquo;s Issues (CWI)
            </a>
            <br />
            Index of popular, activist, and scholarly literature in women&rsquo;s studies.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://0-www.lexisnexis.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/us/lnacademic">
             LexisNexis Academic
            </a>
            <br />
            Full text of thousands of newspapers, magazines, broadcast transcripts, business publications, legal materials, and more.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://0-www.csa.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/htbin/dbrng.cgi?username=muhlenberg&amp;access=welcome&amp;db=socioabs-set-c&amp;adv=1">
             Sociological Abstracts
            </a>
            <br />
            Provides access to the latest research in sociology and related disciplines in the social and behavioral sciences.
           </p>
           <hr align="center" noshade="noshade" size="1" width="45%" />
           <p>
            <strong>
             GETTING THE ARTICLES
            </strong>
           </p>
           <ol>
            <li>
             When searching for articles in library databases, you may find the
             <strong>
              full-text
             </strong>
             of an article
             <strong>
              linked
             </strong>
             in the database.
            </li>
            <li>
             If not, you need to search the
             <strong>
              Trexler Library Catalog
             </strong>
             to see if we own the journal in which the article is published.
             <ul>
              <li>
               Most databases have a
               <strong>
                Check for Full Text
               </strong>
               &nbsp;buttons&nbsp;embedded. Click the link to check our holdings.
              </li>
              <li>
               Otherwise, search the catalog by journal title or by ISSN. Verify that we have online, print, or microform access to the year/volume you need.
              </li>
             </ul>
            </li>
            <li>
             If we do not own the journal you need, request the article via
             <strong>
              Interlibrary Loan
             </strong>
             .
             <ul>
              <li>
               Some databases have a
               <em>
                Request on Interlibrary Loan
               </em>
               link embedded. Click the link to fill out the form. Click Submit.
              </li>
              <li>
               Otherwise, use the
               <a href="https://library.muhlenberg.edu/illj%7ES0">
                Interlibrary Loan Journal Article Request Form
               </a>
               (
               <em>
                Library Homepage &nbsp;--&nbsp; Interlibrary Loan (in the Quick Links box) &nbsp;--&nbsp; Articles request form
               </em>
               ). Fill out the form with as much information as possible.
               <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//forms/ask.html">
                Ask for help
               </a>
               , if you have questions.
              </li>
             </ul>
            </li>
           </ol>
          </blockquote>
          <div id="boxatt17345112" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17345202">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17345202">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17345202">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding Information on Your Social Problem
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17345202">
          <p>
           <strong>
            FINDING BOOKS
           </strong>
          </p>
          <blockquote>
           <p>
            <strong>
             TREXLER LIBRARY
            </strong>
           </p>
           <p>
            Search the
            <a href="http://library.muhlenberg.edu/">
             Trexler Library Catalog
            </a>
            to find out what books, government publications, journals, videos, etc. the library owns.
           </p>
           <blockquote>
            <p>
             <em>
              GETTING THERE: Use the shortcut search box on the
              <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//">
               Library Homepage
              </a>
              or Library Homepage &nbsp;--&nbsp; Library Catalogs (in the Quick Links box) &nbsp;--&nbsp; Trexler Library Catalog
             </em>
            </p>
           </blockquote>
           <p>
            <strong>
             OTHER LIBRARIES
            </strong>
           </p>
           <p>
            <strong>
             WorldCat.
            </strong>
            To find books held by other libraries, search
            <a href="http://0-newfirstsearch.oclc.org.library.muhlenberg.edu/done=http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//;dbname=worldcat;fsip">
             WorldCat
            </a>
            , a database of over 60 million library records from around the country and world. Use the ILL button to request a book from another library. (ILL can take 10-14 days.)
           </p>
           <blockquote>
            <p>
             <em>
              GETTING THERE:
             </em>
             <em>
              Library Homepage &nbsp;--&nbsp; Library Catalogs (in Quick Links box) &nbsp;--&nbsp; Other Library Catalogs&nbsp;--&nbsp;
              <a href="http://0-newfirstsearch.oclc.org.library.muhlenberg.edu/done=http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//;dbname=worldcat;fsip">
               WorldCat
              </a>
             </em>
            </p>
           </blockquote>
          </blockquote>
          <div id="boxatt17345202" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4707697" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17345065">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17345065">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17345065">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17345065">
          <p>
           <em>
            Contact:
            <br />
           </em>
          </p>
          <p>
           <b>
            Jen Jarson
           </b>
           <br />
           Social Sciences Reference Librarian
           <br />
           email: jarson@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
           phone: x3552
           <br />
           IM: jjarson1 (
           <em>
            for AIM and Yahoo; add @hotmail.com for MSN
           </em>
           )
          </p>
          <p>
           Need help after hours?
           <br />
           IM the Library at TalkToTrexler (
           <em>
            for AIM and Yahoo; add @hotmail.com for MSN
           </em>
           )
           <br />
           Online Sunday-Thursday 2pm-10pm.
           <br />
           <em>
            See
            <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//forms/ask.html" target="_blank">
             Ask a Librarian
            </a>
            for more information.
           </em>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17345065" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>

     <div id="footer_topline">
